title: The First Seal
description: Earthquakes have plagued the Lower Ward. Investigation into the deep, flooded sectors of the Undercity reveals massive, ancient chains anchoring something impossibly large to the bedrock. One of the three main seals is breaking.

turns.narrative: You dive into the freezing, totally dark waters of the Drowned Sector. You must navigate using only a magical lumen-stone.
turns.consequence_a: You reach the bottom fast, but attract the attention of several blind, aquatic Scourge-eels.
turns.choice_b: Swim slowly and silently along the walls
turns.consequence_b: You avoid the eels, but your lungs are burning horribly by the time you reach the air pocket near the seal.

turns.narrative: The Seal is a massive, rune-covered stone block. It is cracking. You must repair it using a rare alchemical compound.
turns.choice_a: Patch it perfectly using your Alchemy skill
turns.consequence_a: The seal glows bright blue, stabilizing completely. You stop the earthquake safely.
turns.choice_b: Attempt an improvised patch with common clay and Scourge-blood
turns.consequence_b: It holds, barely. The seal will eventually break, but you bought the city a few days of peace.

seal_perfected.description: You repaired the First Seal perfectly.

conclusion: You repaired the First Seal perfectly.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
